mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Responsibilities and Attributes of a Good Square Dance Caller, by Bill Walker", "Birthday Party Dance International by Louise Dempster", "Overseas Dateline", "What Are They Dancing?", "Interesting People in Square Dancing: Connie Connaughton", "Style Series: Wagon Wheel Allemande and Wagon Wheel Spin", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "An Open Letter to my Dancers: By Russ Adams", "Round the Outside Ring", "Sets in Order Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Jack May", "Paging the Roundancers: Ed and Ann Bodine", and "Experimental Lab: Centers Run, Ends Run".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
